name: cocksfoot
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a kind of grass that is grown for animals such as cows and sheep to eat: The farm has pastures of cocksfoot and wild clover. The types of grass that are most likely to cause allergies are timothy grass, rye grass, cocksfoot, and fescue. Synonym
orchard grass
More examplesFewer examplesThey grow cocksfoot and fescue to provide fodder for the livestock.Avoid using rye grass and cocksfoot when you are planting a new meadow.Cocksfoot and clover swayed unsteadily as the bees hovered above.
